about_the_game:
"High Dragon Tower"is a 2D action/platforming game with random loot and random stage variations.

Use your platforming skills to flap the dragon's wing and climb the high tower. Find the treasures with random loot to upgrade your weapons and face the onslaught of vile dragons upwards ever changing vertical corridors.

In a land of endless night, an heroic caveman goes on a journey to save his famished tribe. He discovers an impossible tower reaching far into the sky. From the top of it, an egg falls and hatches. A young dragon is born and bonds with the caveman. Joining forces, they intend to climb the tower and meet it's owner.

Get high and conquer the tower!
detailed_description:
"High Dragon Tower"is a 2D action/platforming game with random loot and random stage variations.

Use your platforming skills to flap the dragon's wing and climb the high tower. Find the treasures with random loot to upgrade your weapons and face the onslaught of vile dragons upwards ever changing vertical corridors.

In a land of endless night, an heroic caveman goes on a journey to save his famished tribe. He discovers an impossible tower reaching far into the sky. From the top of it, an egg falls and hatches. A young dragon is born and bonds with the caveman. Joining forces, they intend to climb the tower and meet it's owner.

Get high and conquer the tower!
name: High Dragon Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ride the dragon and get high in the tower in this action packed roguelite platformer
